statements.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `[[@table-prefix@]]_users` ( `id` int(10) unsigned not null auto_increment, `email` varchar(32) not null, `password` char(64) not null, `name` varchar(32) not null, `created_on` datetime not null, `modified_on` datetime not null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY (`email`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `[[@table-prefix@]]_sessions` ( `user_id` int(10) unsigned not null, `session` char (64) not null, `challenge` char (64) not null, `created_on` datetime not null, `expires_on` datetime not null ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
